pr_title: TSK-987: Fix Spotbugs - inner class could be made static

timeline.message: TSK-987: Fix Spotbugs - inner class could be made static
TSK-987: Fix Spotbugs - exception is caught when exception is not thrown
TSK-987: Fix Spotbugs - Dead store to local variable

timeline.bodyText:
What is the spotbug error category here?
Removing this line kinda defeats one aspect of the test, since the state value of createdTask2 will NOT be updated and remains in "READY". The test checks if the state is CLAIMED and the CallbackState is REQUIRED, otherwise it will throw an error and add it to the BulkOperationResults . The test will still pass with this change, because this requirement is still not met if the createdTask2's state is not updated, but it was meant to also check if the error is also thrown when the state is CLAIMED (and CallbackState Claimed as well, which will lead to the error)
timeline.author: gitgoodjhe
